Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Eidenhoft Boulevard, east of the Leviathan Fishery Open Market.
Room.LongDescription: The large, open market on the west side of the road provides a number of fresh fish and other ocean delicacies to the general public, caught daily off the shores. The large fish market is a popular place to get fresh fish and seafood for a change of pace from beef and venison.
